resume.tagline: 👋  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.description: In a 6 months L&D program,  I created written documents and small videos that helped transition a traditional design firm using outdated CAD software to a more contemporary operational pipeline using modern BIM software which resulted in improved efficiency and reduced redundant tasks. Skills developed: Facilitation, Writing Practical Documentations

In collaboration with a large team of 12 professionals, I helped with the execution of a week-long Pharmaceutical Exhibition on an international level. My duties consisted of supervising booth assembly & disassembly processes, ensuring the safety of all participants, and translating for and accommodating the needs of foreign participants. Skills developed: Communication, Improvisation
